ai-tha-ap77:1.2_0: he is a disciple of Vipassī.
ai-tha-ap77:1.3_0: I’ve given my alms by herself,
ai-tha-ap77:1.4_0: receives of the world’s material delights.
ai-tha-ap77:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap77:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap77:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable junior.
ai-tha-ap77:6.1_0: for one hundred and fifty senior monks.
